message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $18,000. I believe it presents significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $18,000 is my bottom line. If you can't meet that, I'll have to explore other options.
